$schema.description: Path to JSON schema, which can be used for config autocompletion, use phpactor config:initialize to update

console_dumper_default.description: Name of the "dumper" (renderer) to use for some CLI commands

xdebug_disable.description: If XDebug should be automatically disabled

command.description: Internal use only - name of the command which was executed

core.warn_on_develop.description: Internal use only: if an warning will be issued when on develop, may be removed in the future

core.min_memory_limit.description: Ensure that PHP has a memory_limit of at least this amount in bytes

class_to_file.project_root.description: Root path of the project (e.g. where composer.json is)

class_to_file.brute_force_conversion.description: If composer not found, fallback to scanning all files (very time consuming depending on project size)

code_transform.class_new.variants.description: Variants which should be suggested when class-create is invoked

code_transform.template_paths.description: Paths in which to look for code templates

code_transform.indentation.description: Indentation chars to use in code generation and transformation

code_transform.refactor.generate_accesso.description: Prefix to use for generated accessors
If the first letter of a generated accessor should be made uppercase

code_transform.refactor.generate_mutator.description: Prefix to use for generated mutators
If the first letter of a generated mutator should be made uppercase
If the mutator should be fluent

code_transform.import_globals.description: Import functions even if they are in the global namespace

code_transform.refactor.object_fill.hint.description: Object fill refactoring: show hint as a comment

code_transform.refactor.object_fill.name.description: Object fill refactoring: use named parameters

completion_worse.completor.doctrine_anno.description:
Enable or disable the ``doctrine_annotation`` completor.

Completion for annotations provided by the Doctrine annotation library.

completion_worse.completor.imported_name.description:
Enable or disable the ``imported_names`` completor.

Completion for names imported into the current namespace.

completion_worse.completor.worse_paramet.description:
Enable or disable the ``worse_parameter`` completor.

Completion for method or function parameters.

completion_worse.completor.named_paramet.description:
Enable or disable the ``named_parameter`` completor.

Completion for named parameters.

completion_worse.completor.constructor.e.description:
Enable or disable the ``constructor`` completor.

Completion for constructors.

completion_worse.completor.class_member..description:
Enable or disable the ``class_member`` completor.

Completion for class members.

completion_worse.completor.scf_class.ena.description:
Enable or disable the ``scf_class`` completor.

Brute force completion for class names (not recommended).

completion_worse.completor.local_variabl.description:
Enable or disable the ``local_variable`` completor.

Completion for local variables.

completion_worse.completor.declared_func.description:
Enable or disable the ``declared_function`` completor.

Completion for functions defined in the Phpactor runtime.

completion_worse.completor.declared_cons.description:
Enable or disable the ``declared_constant`` completor.

Completion for constants defined in the Phpactor runtime.

completion_worse.completor.declared_clas.description:
Enable or disable the ``declared_class`` completor.

Completion for classes defined in the Phpactor runtime.

completion_worse.completor.expression_na.description:
Enable or disable the ``expression_name_search`` completor.

Completion for class names, constants and functions at expression positions that are located in the index.

completion_worse.completor.use.enabled.description:
Enable or disable the ``use`` completor.

Completion for use imports.

completion_worse.completor.attribute.ena.description:
Enable or disable the ``attribute`` completor.

Completion for attribute class names.

completion_worse.completor.class_like.en.description:
Enable or disable the ``class_like`` completor.

Completion for class like contexts.

completion_worse.completor.type.enabled.description:
Enable or disable the ``type`` completor.

Completion for types.

completion_worse.completor.keyword.enabl.description:
Enable or disable the ``keyword`` completor.

Completion for keywords (not very accurate).

completion_worse.completor.docblock.enab.description:
Enable or disable the ``docblock`` completor.

Docblock completion.

completion_worse.completor.class.limit.description: Suggestion limit for the filesystem based SCF class_completor

completion_worse.name_completion_priorit.description:
Strategy to use when ordering completion results for classes and functions:

- `proximity`: Classes and functions will be ordered by their proximity to the text document being edited.
- `none`: No ordering will be applied.

completion_worse.debug.description: Include debug info in completion results

completion.dedupe_match_fqn.description: If ``completion.dedupe``, consider the class FQN in addition to the completion suggestion

completion.limit.description: Sets a limit on the number of completion suggestions for any request

completion.label_formatter.description: Definition of how to format entries in the completion list

rpc.replay_path.description: Path where the replays should be stored

language_server_code_transform.import_gl.description: Show hints for non-imported global classes and functions

worse_reflection.enable_cache.description: If reflection caching should be enabled

worse_reflection.cache_lifetime.description: If caching is enabled, limit the amount of time a cache entry can stay alive

worse_reflection.enable_context_location.description:
If source code is passed to a ``Reflector`` then temporarily make it available as a
source location. Note this should NOT be enabled if the source code can be
located in another (e.g. when running a Language Server)

worse_reflection.stub_dir.description: Location of the core PHP stubs - these will be scanned and cached on the first request

worse_reflection.diagnostics.undefined_v.description: Levenshtein distance to use when suggesting corrections for variable names

composer.enable.description: Include of the projects autoloader to facilitate class location. Note that when including an autoloader code _may_ be executed. This option may be disabled when using the indexer

composer.autoloader_path.description: Path to project's autoloader, can be an array

composer.autoload_deregister.description: Immediately de-register the autoloader once it has been included (prevent conflicts with Phpactor's autoloader). Some platforms may require this to be disabled

composer.class_maps_only.description: Register the composer class maps only, do not register the autoloader - RECOMMENDED

console.decorated.description: Whether to decorate messages (null for auto-guessing)

php.version.description:
Consider this value to be the project\'s version of PHP (e.g. `7.4`). If omitted
it will check `composer.json` (by the configured platform then the PHP requirement) before
falling back to the PHP version of the current process.

language_server.enable_workspace.description: If workspace management / text synchronization should be enabled (this isn't required for some language server implementations, e.g. static analyzers)

language_server.session_parameters.description: Phpactor parameters (config) that apply only to the language server session

language_server.method_alias_map.description: Allow method names to be re-mapped. Useful for maintaining backwards compatibility

language_server.diagnostic_sleep_time.description: Amount of time to wait before analyzing the code again for diagnostics

language_server.diagnostics_on_update.description: Perform diagnostics when the text document is updated

language_server.diagnostics_on_save.description: Perform diagnostics when the text document is saved

language_server.diagnostics_on_open.description: Perform diagnostics when opening a text document

language_server.diagnostic_providers.description: Specify which diagnostic providers should be active (default to all)

language_server.diagnostic_outsource.description: If applicable diagnostics should be "outsourced" to a different process

language_server.profile.description: Logs timing information for incoming LSP requests

language_server.trace.description: Log incoming and outgoing messages (needs log formatter to be set to ``json``)

language_server.shutdown_grace_period.description: Amount of time (in milliseconds) to wait before responding to a shutdown notification

language_server.phpactor_bin.description: Internal use only - name path to Phpactor binary

language_server.self_destruct_timeout.description: Wait this amount of time (in milliseconds) after a shutdown request before self-destructing

language_server.diagnostic_outsource_tim.description: Kill the diagnostics process if it outlives this timeout

language_server_completion.trim_leading_.description: If the leading dollar should be trimmed for variable completion suggestions

language_server_reference_reference_find.description: Stop searching for references after this time (in seconds) has expired

language_server_worse_reflection.workspa.description: Minimum interval to update the workspace index as documents are updated (in milliseconds)

language_server_worse_reflection.inlay_h.description: Show inlay type hints for variables

language_server_indexer.reindex_timeout.description: Unconditionally reindex modified files every N seconds

language_server_code_transform.import_na.description: Show an error if a diagnostic name cannot be resolved - can produce false positives

language_server_configuration.auto_confi.description: Prompt to enable extensions which apply to your project on language server start

indexer.enabled_watchers.description: List of allowed watchers. The first watcher that supports the current system will be used

indexer.index_path.description: Path where the index should be saved

indexer.include_patterns.description: Glob patterns to include while indexing

indexer.exclude_patterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude while indexing

indexer.stub_paths.description: Paths to external folders to index. They will be indexed only once, if you want to take any changes into account you will have to reindex your project manually.

indexer.poll_time.description: For polling indexers only: the time, in milliseconds, between polls (e.g. filesystem scans)

indexer.buffer_time.description: For real-time indexers only: the time, in milliseconds, to buffer the results

indexer.follow_symlinks.description: To allow indexer to follow symlinks

indexer.project_root.description: The root path to use for scanning the index

indexer.reference_finder.deep.description: Recurse over class implementations to resolve all references

indexer.implementation_finder.deep.description: Recurse over class implementations to resolve all class implementations (not just the classes directly implementing the subject)

indexer.supported_extensions.description: File extensions (e.g. `php`) for files that should be indexed

object_renderer.template_paths.markdown.description: Paths in which to look for templates for hover information.

language_server_psalm.bin.description: Path to psalm if different from vendor/bin/psalm

language_server_psalm.show_info.description: If infos from psalm should be displayed

language_server_psalm.use_cache.description: If the Psalm cache should be used (see the `--no-cache` option)

language_server_psalm.error_level.description: Override level at which Psalm should report errors (lower => more errors)

language_server_php_cs_fixer.env.description: Environment for PHP CS Fixer (e.g. to set PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV)

language_server_php_cs_fixer.show_diagno.description: Whether PHP CS Fixer diagnostics are shown

behat.config_path.description: Path to the main behat.yml (including the filename behat.yml)

behat.symfony.di_xml_path.description: If using Symfony, set this path to the XML container dump to find contexts which are defined as services

symfony.xml_path.description: Path to the Symfony container XML dump file

completion_worse.completor.symfony.enabl.description: Enable/disable the Symfony completor - depends on Symfony extension being enabled

public_services_only.description: Only consider public services when providing analysis for the service locator
